newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Urban Bank 9-mth net 270.4 mln pesos.
newsitem.headline: Urban Bank 9-mth net 270.4 mln pesos.

text.p: Urban Bank said on Wednesday its net income for the first nine months reached 270.404 million pesos.
It did not give comparative figures for the same period last year but it surpassed by 16 percent its entire 1995 net income of 232.3 million pesos.

The bank earned net interest income of 192.192 million pesos in the nine-month period. Its other income reached 335.545 million pesos, of which 246.061 million pesos came from the net earnings of its affiliates.
Urbancorp Securities, the stockbrokerage affiliate of the bank, said the bank is only 90 million pesos short of its 1996 income target of 360 million pesos.
